title: Search. See. Love.
posting_body: ['Canyon Club Apartments 2665 S.Bruce St, Las Vegas, NV, 89169', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 627 Sq.', 'Ft.  Canyon Club Apartments is ideally located just 10 blocks east of the fabulous Las Vegas Strip.', 'Many of our apartment homes have washer/dryers in the unit.', 'There are also 4 on-site laundry facilities.', 'Our community is close to the University of Nevada at Las Vegas (UNLV), the Boulevard Mall on South Maryland Parkway, Sunrise Hospital, and the LVH Hotel (LV Hilton).', 'Only One Block to Shopping, Schools and Bus Transportation.', 'Office Hours:Monday-Friday 9:00am-6:00pmSaturday and Sunday 9:00am-6:00pm', 'Reserve Today', '<URL>']
